text: Kenneth Sim (; born October 18, 1970) is a Canadian politician and businessman. He is the 40th and current mayor of Vancouver. He was elected on October 15, 2022. Sim is the first Mayor of Vancouver of Chinese Canadian descent. He has a Bachelor of Commerce from the UBC Sauder School of Business. Sim also ran for mayor under the Non-Partisan Association party in 2018 but came second to Kennedy Stewart. He left the party because he felt that it was shifting to the right. During the election, Sim ran under the centre-right ABC Vancouver party. Sim took office on November 7, 2022. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian businesspeople Category:Mayors of Vancouver Category:Politicians from Vancouver Category:University of British Columbia alumni
title: Ken Sim
